2613.name: WRONG_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_OR_MAIL_ADDRESS
2613.message:
The information entered is not correct.
You may have entered a Club Nintendo
account ID or the ID of another service.

Please enter the details again, making
sure that the Nintendo Network ID,
password, and e-mail address are
correct
2613.short_description: Invalid account information provided. Either your username, password, or email address does not match.
2613.long_description: Invalid account information provided. Either your username, password, or email address does not match.
2613.short_solution: Enter corrected information and try again.
2613.long_solution: Enter corrected information and try again.
